message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but $90 is a bit steep for me. Would you consider $70?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counteroffer at $85.
I appreciate you meeting me closer, Alice.  How about we settle at $75?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I get a fair price. I'll counteroffer at $82.50.
